item.title: 关于devops的拼写
item.description: 在看《Effective DevOps》这本书的时候，前言那里有一段关于devops的拼写的说法。 "Devops", "devops", or "DevOps"? We have had many discussions over the capitalization(or lack thereof) of the term "devops", A simple online poll showed overwhelming support for "DevOps". We also found a focus on the "Dev" and "Ops" within organizations, This has lead to the creation of "DevSecOps" and "DevQAOps", as "DevOps" implies an exclusivity of just "Dev" and "Ops". Ultimately, this is why we've chosen "devops" - it reflects the original hashtag on Twitter used to connect people who want to help change conversations from *us versus them* to *enabling the business* with sustainable work practices that focus on people.
